function.name: thermostatMode_setValue
function.description: This function is used to change the thermostat's temperature control mode.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to change the thermostat's temperature control mode.

predefinedThermostatMode.description: The predefined thermostat mode to be set (e.g., automatic, outing, emergency heating, standard).

mode.description: The mode to which the thermostat should be set.
